mosinstall.name: RokSlide
mosinstall.author: RocketWerx
mosinstall.description:
RokLatest News Module

RokSlide is a brand-new Mootools powered tab/slider module. It's very easy to use, just point it to a Joomla! content category and make some simple configuration choices.

This RokSlide module for Joomla is maintained at RocketWerx.Com
ChangeLog:
  • 1.0
    • Initial Release (Rhuk)

param.name: items
param.label: Max No. of Items
param.description: Max No of items to display, left blank, this will display all available

param.name: jslib
param.label: Include Mootools JS Library
param.description: Select whether to include the JS lib as part of this module, Select No if the template already loads this

param.name: jssource
param.label: Include RokSlide JS Script
param.description: Select whether to include the Rokslide JS script as part of this module, Select No if the template already loads this
